modName: The Woulfe Pack - Werewolves - Wolves - Just For Fun
summary:
Work In Progress - This mod adds a pack of giant werewolves in & around Whiterun
Note - I tried to make them followers, but it didn't work at all
Etc - Werewolf, Wolf, Were, Just for fun
descriptionHtml:
Work In Progress - This mod adds a pack of giant werewolves in & around Whiterun
Note - I tried to make them followers, but it didn't work at all

If anyone knows anything about adding voices please tell me how to do it
I'd like to add voices to these characters myself as I do them for a online puppet show I do
Also open to suggestions on how to improve them, like perhaps they give you a quest
Or they help you train in different things, carry supplies, carry weapons, carry food & drink, etc
author: The Woulfe Pack
